snippet: Paul Romer, an expert on economic growth, is out of his own project, tripped up by the sort of opaque decision making that his plan was supposed to change.
abstract: Economist Paul Romer backs out of controversial 'charter city' project he started with the government of Honduras after Honduran agency overseeing project fails to consult him before signing a memorandum of understanding with its first investor group.
lead_paragraph: Paul Romer, an expert on economic growth, is out of his own project, tripped up by the sort of opaque decision making that his plan was supposed to change.

headline.seo: Charter City Plan to Fight Honduras Poverty Loses Initiator
headline.main: Plan for Charter City to Fight Honduras Poverty Loses Its Initiator
headline.print_headline: Plan for Charter City to Fight Honduras Poverty Loses Its Initiator
